actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that individuals who have attained age 59 1/2 may contribute to individual retirement accounts without regard to their compensation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals who have attained age 59 and one-half to deduct amounts contributed to individual retirement accounts without regard to their compensation.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that individuals who have attained age 59 1/2 may contribute to individual retirement accounts without regard to their compensation.
